law.catch_line: An applicant for a license shall submit to the executive director of the Commission an application:...

text.section:
An applicant for a license shall submit to the executive director of the Commission an application:
in the form that the Commission requires; and
on or before a day that the Commission sets.

The application shall state:
the dates of the race meetings desired;
the maximum number of racing days desired; and
any other information that the Commission requires.
